remarks: If the modular pair property holds in a sublattice, it holds in the whole lattice.  Lemma 1.4 of [MaedaMaeda] p. 2.  (Contributed by NM, 28-Apr-2006.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
mdsl.1 $e |- A e. CH $.
mdsl.2 $e |- B e. CH $.
mdsl2i $p |- ( A MH B <-> A. x e. CH ( ( ( A i^i B ) C_ x /\ x C_ B ) -> ( ( x vH A ) i^i B ) C_ ( x vH ( A i^i B ) ) ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
